title: Victim ID'd in fatal Hammond shooting
content:
HAMMOND — A 23-year-old woman died Saturday after being shot inside a vehicle in the 4700 block of Hohman Avenue, according to Hammond police Lt. Richard Hoyda.
Megan Jaronski, of Hammond, was pronounced dead at 1:05 p.m. at Franciscan St. Margaret Health hospital, according to the Lake County coroner's office. The cause of death was a gun shot wound with manner of death still pending, according to the coroner's office.
